text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion specifically asks if the response lists applicable benefits of Italian Dirigente (manager) roles, such as minimum wage via CCNL, mandatory life insurance (€300k/€400k), and mandatory subscription to the \"FASI\" retirement fund.
